settings.popupcontentshipping:
SHIPPING
  • Complimentary ground shipping within 1 to 7 business days
  • In-store collection available within 1 to 7 business days
  • Next-day and Express delivery options also available
  • Purchases are delivered in an orange box tied with a Bolduc ribbon, with the exception of certain items
  • See the delivery FAQs for details on shipping methods, costs and delivery times
RETURNS AND EXCHANGES
  • Easy and complimentary, within 14 days
  • See conditions and procedure in our return FAQs

settings.text1:
RVRB-034
RINGO DEATHSTARR - LEVITATION SESSIONS
RVRB-032: FRANKIE AND THE WITCH FINGERS - CAVEHEAD
RVRB-030 : RINGO DEATHSTARR - S/T
RVRB-029 : HOLY WAVE - INTERLOPER

settings.text2: STREAM TICKETS + LIMITED EDITION VINYL & MERCH

LEVITATION SESSIONS are live performance films created by the artists and then streamed worldwide & released as live albums. The best bands, impeccable audio and unique locations. Sonic bliss for your eyes and ears.

Our mission at LEVITATION is to be a platform where the art and music we love can thrive. #LevitationSessions are our way to support the bands and keep the music going through the pandemic. Enjoy!

settings.data: SESSIONS TRACKS + FULL SHOWS

settings.text2: RED FANG • NOTHING • STARCRAWLER • FRANKIE ROSE • HERE LIES MAN • ENUMCLAW
settings.text3:
Here's our first taste of the LEVITATION 2021 weekend - a 2 stage lineup stacked with riffs and sonic bliss.
Tickets on sale Friday, June 4 at 10am CT!

If you have any issues using the ticket form below click HERE.

settings.data:
LEVITATION returns to downtown Austin, Texas on October 28-31, 2021! We’re looking forward to seeing everyone in Austin for another epic weekend of music and art.

Stay tuned for the lineup, individual tickets & 4 Day Passes coming soon...

STAY TUNED FOR THE FULL LINEUP!

You can sign up to get the good news in your inbox here:


NEWSLETTER SIGN UP

Please make sure you've read and understand our Covid-19 health and safety requirements for LEVITATION 2021 events:


HEALTH & SAFETY

settings.text2: STAY TUNED FOR FINAL LINEUP ADDITIONS + THE VISUAL ARTIST LINEUP
Please make sure you've read and understand our Covid-19 health and safety requirements for LEVITATION 2021 events:

settings.data:
Like all other events, LEVITATION 2021 is having to adjust to the times we're living in. We plan to put all of these safety protocols in place at each venue with the goal to keep attendees, artists and staff as safe as possible. Thank you for your understanding.

UPDATED SEPT 13, 2021

settings.text3:
* We reserve the right to update these requirements between now and the event. Please check this page prior to attending for the latest info and updates.*


ENTRY REQUIREMENTS

As you enter the venue, you will need to present:

  • Digital or Printed Eventbrite Ticket
  • A valid, government-issued photo ID
  • Negative Covid-19 PCR Test result


A printed copy of a negative COVID-19 PCR test result will be required to attend LEVITATION 2021 events.

The negative COVID-19 printed test result must be obtained within 72 hours (3 days) of attending any show at LEVITATION 2021.

Not only do we strongly believe these protocols will mitigate the risks of spreading Covid-19, but additionally these protocols are required by many artists performing at LEVITATION 2021 - making it impossible to hold the event without these requirements in place.

Please note that vaccination is not required to attend LEVITATION 2021.

4 DAY PASS HOLDERS - the PCR test requirement is PER show. So if you are attending a show on Sunday, Oct 31st, you will still need a result from a test taken within 72 hours of entry.


PROOF OF VACCINATION INFO

Patrons who are fully vaccinated may show proof of full COVID-19 vaccination instead of proof of negative test. A person is considered fully vaccinated 14 days after the second shot of Pfizer/Moderna or single shot of J&J.

For example, the last possible date to get your second shot for entry on Thursday, October 27 would be October 13th.

If you have questions about the COVID-19 vaccines or need resources to find a vaccination location near you, please check out vaccinefinder.org ‍



TESTING INFO

GET TESTED. We strongly encourage everyone, including those who are vaccinated to check their COVID status before attending LEVITATION.

For a list of FREE community-based testing sites near you, visit the U.S. Department of Health & Human Services.

Please keep in mind that test results often take 24 hours to receive, and that testing lab demand can fluctuate.


MASK REQUIREMENTS

Information related to masks will be released closer to the event dates, but attendees should be prepared for the following requirements:

Masks will be required at all indoor venues, and outdoors in the following situations: in all lines, while ordering drinks / food / merchandise, in restrooms, and anywhere else that social distancing is not possible.

All people, staff, attendees and artists, must wear a mask at all times indoors.

Attendees who are unable to meet mask requirements will be asked to leave the event, without refund.


ADDITIONAL INFORMATION

These policies are subject to change, in accordance with state and local guidelines and changing circumstances.

We will be updating procedures as necessary as we get closer to October 27th.

For the most up-to-date information check the LEVITATION 2021 website: levitation.fm/health/ and follow our social media accounts. ‍


HEALTH PLEDGE

For the sake of other attendees, staff and artists, we ask that you not attend if any of the following is true for you or anyone in your party:

  • Within 14 days before attending LEVITATION, if you have tested positive, or been exposed to someone who has tested positive for, COVID-19;

  • Within 72 hours prior to attending LEVITATION, if you have experienced symptoms of COVID-19 (e.g., a fever of 100.4F or higher, cough, shortness of breath or difficulty breathing, chills, repeated shaking muscle pain/achiness, headache, sore throat, loss of taste or smell, nasal congestion, runny nose, vomiting, diarrhea, fatigue or any other symptoms associated with COVID-19 identified by the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention)

  • Within 14 days prior to attending LEVITATION, you have travelled to any international territory identified by federal or applicable state or local governments as being subject to travel or quarantine advisories due to COVID-19.


UN-VACCINATED PATRONS

We highly recommend that you do NOT ATTEND any large gathering indoors or outdoors without being vaccinated but if you do decide to take that risk we will be requiring the following to attend: You must obtain a negative COVID-19 PCR test result no more than 72 hours prior to picking up your passes/tickets.

This test must be a PCR test from a lab and not a rapid or at home test and this test must have the date and time stamp clearly displayed. The negative COVID-19 PCR test can be printed or a digital test result will be acceptable.

You will also have to show a valid, government-issued photo ID or passport that has the same name as your negative COVID-19 PCR test.

Attendees under 12, who cannot be vaccinated, can show a negative test to attend the outside venues that are all ages. Attendees under 12 who are not vaccinated should wear a mask at all times and be accompanied by a paid parent or legal guardian at all times. Children 5 and under can attend all ages venues for free under the same Covid protocols.  See above for negative Covid-19 PCR test requirements.

Attendees with a medical condition or closely held religious belief that prevents vaccination can attend with proof of a recent negative coronavirus test. See above for negative Covid- 19 test requirements.

If you are not vaccinated, we encourage you to wear a mask at all times even if you’ve received a negative COVID PCR test in the last 72 hours.


FULLY VACCINATED PATRONS

Full COVID vaccination must have been completed by OCTOBER 14th, 2021.

The last day to receive your second Moderna or Pfizer vaccine, or single dose of Johnson and Johnson is Thursday, October 14th.

An original copy, photocopy, or digital copy (such as a picture on your phone) of your vaccination card will be accepted. You will also have to show a valid, government-issued photo ID or passport that has the same name as your vaccination card.

GET THE TEST BEFORE YOU FEST. We strongly encourage everyone, including those who are vaccinated to check their covid status before attending LEVITATION. For a list of FREE community-based testing sites near you, check the U.S. Department of Health & Human Services.

Why is this policy necessary?

Taking this step ensures the safety of our guests, staff, and the artists, and implementing this simple measure minimizes risk and the spread of the virus. Policies like these have become the industry standard for live music and events, and are also required of all staff, volunteers and all performers and their crew and this is an extension of those precautions. We are asking you to help us do the same in taking the necessary precautions to ensure the safety of not only yourself but the people around you attending, working, and performing.

What if I test positive?

Do not attend LEVITATION if you have tested positive for COVID-19 in the last 14 days. People who have tested positive for COVID-19 prior to picking up their LEVITATION passes / tickets and cannot attend the event can receive a refund. Please contact us at info@levitation.fm if you find yourself in that situation.

Other COVID-19 Safety Protocols at LEVITATION

Levitation and hosting venues will follow all CDC and local guidelines.

We are also asking all venues to put out additional sanitation for attendees and make sure bathrooms are cleaned and restocked regularly as well as high touch areas.

We are also asking venues to keep doors open to help circulate the air during shows.

We ask that you do not attend if any of the following is true for you or anyone in your party:

  • Within 14 days before attending the festival you have tested positive, or been exposed to someone who has tested positive for, COVID-19

  • Within 72 hours prior to attending the festival, you have experienced symptoms of COVID-19 (e.g., a fever of 100.4F or higher, cough, shortness of breath or difficulty breathing, chills, repeated shaking muscle pain/achiness, headache, sore throat, loss of taste or smell, nasal congestion, runny nose, vomiting, diarrhea, fatigue or any other symptoms associated with COVID-19 identified by the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention)

  • Within 14 days prior to attending the festival, you have traveled to any international territory identified by federal or applicable state or local governments as being subject to travel or quarantine advisories due to COVID-19

BEFORE THE EVENT
  • We recommend getting vaccinated, that’s going to provide ease of entry into the event and vaccinations have been proven to be effective in mitigating the effects of COVID-19.

  • We are encouraging everyone to check their COVID status to help prevent the spread of COVID-19

  • Stay healthy. Healthy eating, exercise, and proper sleep are all key elements to keeping your body’s immune system strong.

AT LEVITATION

  • Wear a mask if you are unvaccinated at all times If you are unvaccinated or at high risk for severe COVID-19, avoid crowded areas of events and stay at least 6 feet away from other groups

  • Avoid physical contact with people outside of your party

  • Wash your hands frequently with soap and water, or with hand sanitizer containing at least 60% alcohol

  • Limit consumption of substances. Consuming alcohol or substances may impede your immune system and make you less likely to follow COVID-19 safety measures

  • Please do not attend if you have symptoms of COVID-19 (fever, chills, cough, shortness of breath, fatigue, muscle or body aches, headache, new loss of taste or smell, sore throat, congestion or runny nose, nausea or vomiting, diarrhea), even if you have been vaccinated

  • Do not attend LEVITATION if you have tested positive for COVID-19 in the last 14 days.

  • People who have tested positive for COVID-19 prior to picking up their LEVITATION passes / tickets and cannot attend the event can receive a refund. Please contact us at info@levitation.fm if you find yourself in that situation.

OUTSIDE LEVITATION EVENTS

Remember that any shows and events outside of LEVITATION may have different COVID-19 protocols

Outdoor music events are safer than indoor events

Outdoor dining options are safer than indoor dining options If you are attending an indoor event and are unvaccinated, wear a mask and maintain 6-foot distance from other parties at all times.

WHEN YOU GET HOME

Stay home and get tested if you develop any symptoms of COVID-19, even if you are fully vaccinated

* We reserve the right to update these requirements between now and the event. Please check this page prior to attending for the latest info and updates.*
